img.alt: Horizontally flying bullet strikes the midpoint of a vertical pivoted bar

problem.p: A thick uniform bar of mass \(m\) and length \(d\) is suspended vertically, pivoted at the top. A bullet of the same mass \(m\), flying horizontally at an unknown speed, strikes the midpoint of the bar and gets stuck in it. The bar swings upward and comes to a momentary stop in the horizontal position. Find the speed of the bullet before it strikes the bar.
